name: Jody VanHoose
title: Front-End Developer
description: Hello my name is Jody, I'm a Front End Web Developer who has a passion for tech. I am also a Physical Therapist Assistant and currently in a leadership role with many years of experience in healthcare bringing many other qualifications with me like excellent oral/written communication, great teamwork skills, and problem solving. I am highly motivated dedicated. Let's get in touch.

name: Daniele Longo
title: Front-End Developer
description: I am a motivated Frontend Developer / Fullstack Software Engineer passionate about problem-solving with creative solutions and a keen eye for visual aesthetics that follow good design principles. My 10+ years of experience as a graphic designer developing print, digital, and motion graphics materials allowed me to grow as a reliable and results-driven team player that delivers with a growth mindset and commitment to success.

name: Alex Curtis-Slep
title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Hello, I'm a full stack dev, who leverages React, JavaScript and SCSS to solve problems with gusto. I enjoy contributing to open source, learning new languages and frameworks, and helping other developers along their journey.

name: Steve Smodish
title: Software Developer
description: I'm looking for my first developer role. My interests skew towards Back End and DevOps.
